name: Lexington Towers
description:
lexington towers

================

by alex & dorothy ray

notes

=====

10/31/15

it's a lot prettier outside. the people inside look very busy.

10/25/15

new sounds and sights. enjoy the feeling of walking around safe at night. take a seat on a bench and watch the fireflies.

10/23/15

it's a lot more interesting outside. you could climb a hill or play in the grass

10/22/15

take a nice quiet urban night walk or jog around the grounds

10/20/15

just a lamp post right now
